20110110050333.000|20110110050335.000|CC1|HER HUSBAND, AND THEN THEY

20110110050421.000|20110110050424.000|CC1|BUT IS RESPONDING TO SIMPLE     
20110110050424.000|20110110050424.000|CC1|COMMANDS AFTER BEING SHOT       
20110110050424.000|20110110050427.000|CC1|YESTERDAY IN HER HOME DISTRICT.

20110110051256.000|20110110051300.000|CC1|MINUTES.                        
20110110051300.000|20110110051303.000|CC1|THIS KIND OF EFFORT, THIS       
20110110051303.000|20110110051304.000|CC1|OUTCOME WAS REALLY POSSIBLE     
20110110051304.000|20110110051304.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THESE RESOURCES.     
20110110051304.000|20110110051305.000|CC1|LET ME TAKE BACK TO THE SEQUENCE
20110110051305.000|20110110051306.000|CC1|OF EVENTS COMING TO CLEAR SOME  
20110110051306.000|20110110051307.000|CC1|OF THE INFORMATION OUT THERE.   
20110110051307.000|20110110051308.000|CC1|CONGRESS WOMAN GIFFORDS WAS SHOT
20110110051308.000|20110110051308.000|CC1|IN AHEAD.                       
20110110051308.000|20110110051309.000|CC1|WHEN SHE ARRIVED HERE, THE      
20110110051309.000|20110110051309.000|CC1|REPORTS WERE THAT SHE WAS ABLE  
20110110051309.000|20110110051312.000|CC1|TO FOLLOW COMMANDS, RESPONSIVE  
20110110051312.000|20110110051315.000|CC1|TO VERBAL COMMUNICATIONS.       
20110110051315.000|20110110051318.000|CC1|WE QUICKLY GOT HER BACK TO THE  
20110110051318.000|20110110051319.000|CC1|ZERO ARE WITHIN 38 MINUTES, AS  
20110110051319.000|20110110051319.000|CC1|YOU HEARD.                      
20110110051319.000|20110110051323.000|CC1|-- DAUGHTER BACK TO THE         
20110110051323.000|20110110051323.000|CC1|OPERATING ROOM.                 
20110110051323.000|20110110051326.000|CC1|WE WENT TO WORK ROUTINE         
20110110051326.000|20110110051327.000|CC1|PROCEDURE FOR THIS TYPE OF      
20110110051327.000|20110110051328.000|CC1|INJURY.                         
20110110051328.000|20110110051329.000|CC1|THAT CONSISTED OF CONTROLLING   
20110110051329.000|20110110051331.000|CC1|THE BLEEDING WHICH WAS NOT

20110110051332.000|20110110051337.000|CC1|OUR NEXT OBJECTIVE WAS TO TAKE  
20110110051337.000|20110110051338.000|CC1|THE PRESSURE OF THE BRAIN BY    
20110110051338.000|20110110051339.000|CC1|REMOVING THE BONE FRAGMENTS

20110110051349.000|20110110051350.000|CC1|AND I AM HAPPY TO SAY WE DID
